Articles.Content: there seem to be some problems with the new version of the physics engine. When i enjoy the new version, i found that the side boosers always go into the tank and explode, especially the largest one. it did not happened in the old version. if it is a error, i hope it will be fixed in the next version.

On 7/12/2020 at 12:13 PM, alberro+ said:

I'd prefer it being something related to JAXA. CNSA always leaves a bad hypergolic taste in my mouth.

that's true and it have launched hundreds of rockets with hypergolic fuel (look at that red smoke coming out of the engines).  recently it is making LH-LOX CZ-5 rockets.

But i think it'll be amazing to have those red smokes in ksp when using a hypergolic engine
